vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with Pacheco Koch Consulting Engineers, Inc. to provide preliminary engineering design for the Five Mile Infrastructure Improvements -  Project 1 and final engineering design services for Persimmon Road from Bonnie View Road to Tracy Road - Not to exceed $823,595.00 - Financing: Community Development Block Grant Fund ($756,595.00), Water Construction Fund ($28,000.00) and Wastewater Capital Improvement E Fund ($39,000.00)
vote.description: Authorize a professional services contract with Pacheco Koch Consulting Engineers, Inc. to provide preliminary engineering design for the Five Mile Infrastructure Improvements -  Project 1 and final engineering design services for Persimmon Road from Bonnie View Road to Tracy Road - Not to exceed $823,595.00 - Financing: Community Development Block Grant Fund ($756,595.00), Water Construction Fund ($28,000.00) and Wastewater Capital Improvement E Fund ($39,000.00)
